form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To apply the requirements of the Federal Advisory Committee Act to the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bureau Advisory Commission Transparency Act.
Section 1013 of the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 (12 U.S.C. 5493) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any provision of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (5 U.S.C. App.), such Act shall apply to each advisory committee of the Bureau and each subcommittee of such an advisory committee.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives April 13, 2015.
